# Arguments

**Associated Type**

The arguments that this tool should accept.

## Declaration

```swift
associatedtype Arguments : ConvertibleFromGeneratedContent
```

## Discussion

Typically arguments are either a [doc://com.apple.foundationmodels/documentation/FoundationModels/Generable] type or [doc://com.apple.foundationmodels/documentation/FoundationModels/GeneratedContent].

## Invoking a tool

- **call(arguments:)**: A language model will call this method when it wants to leverage this tool.
- **Output**: The output that this tool produces for the language model to reason about in subsequent interactions.

items.description: A language model will call this method when it wants to leverage this tool.
